document_data.name: Wylan Burral
document_data.titles: Lord Priest{{Cite adventurers league/Breath of the Yellow Rose|9}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Wylan Burral''' was a high-ranking member of the [[Cult of the Black Earth]] in [[Mulmaster]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Sword of Selfaril|15}}
document_data.Personality: On the surface, Wylan was a jovial and friendly individual, wanting to enjoy the finer things in life. He was quick to offer a drink, a joke, or (more commonly) both. However, it was all a facade: in truth, he was full of determined malice and passion for his cause. He usually encouraged bold actions as a sign of his (false) devotion to Tymora.{{Cite adventurers league/Black Heart of Vengeance|16}}
